--- arieroy2002 <arieroy@...> wrote:
> From an example on your website I get the impression
> that you only
> present the coverage percentages (and perhaps the
> number of lines
> versus the total number of lines).

Sorry, they are there but you have to navigate to the
class/package breakdown first.  Here is a sample page
with standard red/green coloring:

http://www.testersedge.com/gjtk/samples/line_html_report/total/junit.framework.TestSuite.html

Since 20% of men can't tell red from green however,
lines are also marked with +/- and the colors are
easily altered through CSS.

Scott
